title: Trump Announces Tariff Increase on Canada Over Reagan Ad Spat
summary: The ad, which will stop airing on Monday, used audio of a 1987 address by Ronald Reagan making a case against tariffs.

title: Trump’s Asia Tour: Deals, Diplomacy and a Meeting With Xi
summary: From Kuala Lumpur to Gyeongju, President Trump is casting himself as a deal-maker and peace negotiator, while a wary region looks for tariff relief and steadier ties.

title: In Trump, Families of Cambodian Troops Detained by Thailand See Hope
summary: They are expecting President Trump will do for their loved ones what he did for the hostages held by Hamas: set in motion a plan that leads to their release.

title: Timothy Mellon Is Donor Who Gave $130 Million to Pay Troops During Shutdown
summary: Timothy Mellon is a billionaire and a major financial backer of President Trump.

title: As Vance Takes on a Forceful New Role, His Positions Are Shifting
summary: Vice President JD Vance has found himself defending or promoting positions that he once opposed, even as recently as the campaign.

title: Did Cheating Accusations Have Anything to Do With the Death of a Daniel Naroditsky?
summary: Daniel Naroditsky, a top American player with an online following, was found dead in Charlotte, N.C., after talking about being accused of cheating by a former world champion.

title: Canada-U.S. Tensions Stay on Baseball Field During Blue Jays-Dodgers World Series
summary: At Game 1 of the World Series in Toronto on Friday, overt politics were absent. Unity between the two nations was on display before the first pitch.

title: Burnin’ Down the House
summary: Demolition Man builds a monument to his wrecking-ball style.

title: Trump’s Path of Destruction Is Far-Reaching
summary: From Venezuela to the East Wing of the White House.

title: Trump Backs Milei, But Argentina’s Elections Will Test His Popularity
summary: President Javier Milei of Argentina has earned U.S. support, but he faces a critical legislative election at home amid voter anger over job losses and corruption scandals.

title: June Lockhart, Beloved Television Mother, Dies at 100
summary: She exuded earnest maternal wisdom and wistful contentment as a farm wife on “Lassie” and, later, as an interplanetary castaway on “Lost in Space.”

title: Honduran Man Struck and Killed On a Virginia Highway While Fleeing ICE
summary: ICE officers were in the process of detaining Josue Castro-Rivera, 24, of Honduras, before he ran onto a busy highway in Norfolk and was struck by a pickup truck, officials said.
